alert.note: Alert for Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 1:58PM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the High Wind Watch, light snow will be possible at times Tuesday night through Wednesday. Minor accumulations are possible, and combined with the strong winds, the snow could lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
